languages.text: {n}Однако не изящество линий и цветов завладевает вашим вниманием, а набросок темной фигуры, дорисованный еще более умелой рукой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Однако не изящество линий и цветов завладевает вашим вниманием, а набросок темной фигуры, дорисованный еще более умелой рукой.{/n}

languages.text: {n}But your attention is drawn not to the fine lines and shading, but the sketch of a dark figure added in by a still more masterful hand.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Однако не изящество линий и цветов завладевает вашим вниманием, а набросок темной фигуры, дорисованный еще более умелой рукой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}But your attention is drawn not to the fine lines and shading, but the sketch of a dark figure added in by a still more masterful hand.{/n}
{n}But your attention is drawn not to the fine lines and shading, but the sketch of a dark figure added in by a still more masterful hand.{/n}
{n}But your attention is drawn not to the fine lines and shading, but the sketch of a dark figure added in by a still more masterful hand.{/n}
{n}But your attention is drawn not to the fine lines and shading, but the sketch of a dark figure added in by a still more masterful hand.{/n}
{n}But your attention is drawn not to the fine lines and shading, but the sketch of a dark figure added in by a still more masterful hand.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pero tu atención no se centra en el fino trazo ni en las sombras, sino en el boceto de una figura siniestra añadida por una mano aún más diestra.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But your attention is drawn not to the fine lines and shading, but the sketch of a dark figure added in by a still more masterful hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pero tu atención no se centra en el fino trazo ni en las sombras, sino en el boceto de una figura siniestra añadida por una mano aún más diestra.{/n}

languages.text: {n}しかし、あなたが注目するのは、繊細な線や陰影ではなく、さらに卓越した手で描かれた暗い人物の絵である。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But your attention is drawn not to the fine lines and shading, but the sketch of a dark figure added in by a still more masterful hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}しかし、あなたが注目するのは、繊細な線や陰影ではなく、さらに卓越した手で描かれた暗い人物の絵である。{/n}

languages.text: {n}不过，吸引你注意力的并不是精细的线条与阴影，而是旁边画的黑色人物的素描，是某个技艺更纯熟的人画上去的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But your attention is drawn not to the fine lines and shading, but the sketch of a dark figure added in by a still more masterful hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}不过，吸引你注意力的并不是精细的线条与阴影，而是旁边画的黑色人物的素描，是某个记忆更纯熟的人画上去的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aber deine Aufmerksamkeit gehört nicht den feinen Linien und Schatten, sondern der Skizze einer dunklen Gestalt, die von einer noch meisterlicheren Hand hinzugefügt wurde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But your attention is drawn not to the fine lines and shading, but the sketch of a dark figure added in by a still more masterful hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aber deine Aufmerksamkeit gehört nicht den feinen Linien und Schatten, sondern der Skizze einer dunklen Gestalt, die von einer noch meisterlicheren Hand hinzugefügt wurde.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ce n'est pas le raffinement des lignes et le jeu des ombres qui attirent votre attention, mais plutôt l'esquisse d'une silhouette sombre dessinée d'une main de maître.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But your attention is drawn not to the fine lines and shading, but the sketch of a dark figure added in by a still more masterful hand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ce n'est pas le raffinement des lignes et le jeu des ombres qui attirent votre attention, mais plutôt l'esquisse d'une silhouette sombre dessinée d'une main de maître.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ancak dikkatini ince çizgiler ve gölgelendirmeler değil; daha da becerikli bir el tarafından eklenmiş, karanlık bir figürün eskizi çekiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}But your attention is drawn not to the fine lines and shading, but the sketch of a dark figure added in by a still more masterful hand.{/n}
